channel.title: [PI] Funpk
channel.description:
okay, there's a funpk in Erased Pkz base and it has a timer, okay? Are you lost yet? Well, moving on; the glitch is this:
1. Player 1 stands next to player 2. 2. Player 1 follows player 2. 3. Player 2 kills him and right when he dies, Player 2 runs into safezone. 4. Player 1 loses stuff on death in safezone.
Should i just remove safezone?
I have tried to solve it, but it failed, so that's why i'm asking moparscape members.

item.title: [PI] Funpk
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:1, topic:400014”]okay, there’s a funpk in Erased Pkz base and it has a timer, okay? Are you lost yet? Well, moving on; the glitch is this:

  1. Player 1 stands next to player 2.
  2. Player 1 follows player 2.
  3. Player 2 kills him and right when he dies, Player 2 runs into safezone.
  4. Player 1 loses stuff on death in safezone.

Should i just remove safezone?

I have tried to solve it, but it failed, so that’s why i’m asking moparscape members.[/quote]

Doesnt make sense, what im getting is that if i kill you, and i run to safezone when u die, u lose items?
then theoretically your funpk isnt a funpk, but i can help you out, add my msn: helpme@graduate.org

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Funpk

item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

Yeah. I’d say remove safezone
